oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vergleich verschiedener direkten Regulierungsmöglichkeiten der Trauermücken in der biologischen Topfkräuterproduktion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Koller, Martin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sciarid flies (or fungus gnat, Bradysia sp.) are the most important pests in organic production of potted herbs. Our experiments show, that control with the nematode Steinernema feltiae is most successful, with an efficacy of 69-90 % at 24 °C air temperature. Azadirachtin (Neem-seed oil) could be an alternative under hot condition (> 28 °C). Bacillus thuringiensis israelensis, however, showed only a minor effect (1- 54 % efficacy).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Koller, Martin (2009) Vergleich verschiedener direkten Regulierungsmöglichkeiten der Trauermücken in der biologischen Topfkräuterproduktion. Poster at: 10. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Zürich, 11.-13. Februar 2009.
